properties.description: Blocks deployment of selected public network edge services (load balancers with public IPs, Azure Firewall and Site to Site VPN) in the target management group.

nonComplianceMessages.message: Deployment of load balancers (excluding LB named kubernetes) with public IP frontends is blocked by the Network Edge security policy. Please remove the public IP configuration or request an exemption.
Deployment of Azure Firewall resources is blocked by the Network Edge security policy. Review your design or request an exemption.
Deployment of Site to Site VPN resources is blocked by the Network Edge security policy. Review your design or request an exemption.

metadata.assignedBy: Policy Initiative Assigned by Platform Team as part of Q1 2026 policy rollout
